feature: Ergonomic design (Easy to hold and cup) Eleven micro-detent volume control Modified positive contact 1/4 in.guitar type connector (use any guitar cord) Wireless system compatible Microphone body and grille are made of a special high-strength thermo resin combo (Shaker Sono Resin) Handmade in Arkansas, USA
It broke all the rules 22 years ago, and is still giving harp players a big wall of sound in a smaller, easier-to-cup blues tool

Ergonomic design (Easy to hold and cup) Eleven micro-detent volume control Modified positive contact 1/4 in.guitar type connector (use any guitar cord) Wireless system compatible Microphone body and grille are made of a special high-strength thermo resin combo (Shaker Sono Resin) Handmade in Arkansas, USA
It broke all the rules 22 years ago, and is still giving harp players a big wall of sound in a smaller, easier-to-cup blues tool
It is designed for harp players seeking huge, fat tone, and strong harmonic content with almost no feedback
The volume control has 11 micro-detents, or clicks, that tells you where your mic volume is set at, giving you a point of reference and more control of your sound
